option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#F5F5F5">
<!-- Barra Superior --> <View android:id="@+id/viewBarraSuperior" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="80dp" android:background="#8B6F47" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Botão Voltar --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/btnVoltarInventario" android:layout_width="56dp" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
android:padding="12dp" android:scaleType="fitCenter" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" app:tint="@android:color/white"
android:src="@drawable/leftarrow" android:contentDescription="Voltar" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Título --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvTituloInventario" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="28dp" android:text="Inventário de Produtos" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="22sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Contador de Produtos -->
<!-- RecyclerView para lista de produtos --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerViewProdutos" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingBottom="80dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/viewBarraSuperior" tools:listitem="@android:layout/simple_list_item_2" />
<!-- TextView para mensagem quando não há produtos --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvMensagemVazio" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Nenhum produto cadastrado.\nClique em + para adicionar." android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="16sp" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/viewBarraSuperior" />
<!-- Botão Flutuante para Adicionar Produto --> <com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton android:id="@+id/fabAdicionarProduto" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="24dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:backgroundTint="#8B6F47" android:contentDescription="Adicionar Produto" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_input_add" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:tint="@android:color/white" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#F5F5F5">
<!-- Barra Superior --> <View android:id="@+id/viewBarraSuperior" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="80dp" android:background="#8B6F47" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Botão Voltar --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/btnVoltarInventario" android:layout_width="56dp" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
android:padding="12dp" android:scaleType="fitCenter" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" app:tint="@android:color/white"
android:src="@drawable/leftarrow" android:contentDescription="Voltar" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Título --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvTituloInventario" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="28dp" android:text="Inventário de Produtos" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="22sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Contador de Produtos -->
<!-- RecyclerView para lista de produtos --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerViewProdutos" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingBottom="80dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/viewBarraSuperior" tools:listitem="@android:layout/simple_list_item_2" />
<!-- TextView para mensagem quando não há produtos --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvMensagemVazio" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Nenhum produto cadastrado.\nClique em + para adicionar." android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="16sp" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/viewBarraSuperior" />
<!-- Botão Flutuante para Adicionar Produto --> <com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton android:id="@+id/fabAdicionarProduto" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="24dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:backgroundTint="#8B6F47" android:contentDescription="Adicionar Produto" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_input_add" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:tint="@android:color/white" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
